Careers

Passionate about design? Join us.



We are always looking for great people to join us at Mondreem. We value exceptional talent and empower our employees to break boundaries through innovation and great design.

The Studio offers a competitive benefits package, including:


  • Birthday leave in addition to 25 days of holiday
  • Support for training and development
  • Flexible office hours, finishing early on Fridays
  • Bonus scheme

If you are interested in working with us, please send your CV and portfolio (if applicable) to enquiries@mondreem.com.

We are always on the lookout for talent and will recruit exceptional, inspiring and inspirational candidates.

Internship for graduates

Are you a graduate interior designer looking to work in the high-end residential market?

Mondreem offers four-week placements for graduate interns at our studio in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.

To apply or for more information about our internship program please send your CV and portfolio, or work samples, to intern@mondreem.com.

Internship for graduates

Are you a graduate architect looking to work in the high-end residential market?

Mondreem offers four-week placements for graduate interns at our studio in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.

To apply or for more information about our internship program please send your CV and portfolio, or work samples, to intern@mondreem.com.

Let's work together

If you would like to discuss a future interior design project, or learn more about Mondreem, please contact us.
